name: Milkround Online
overview:
Milkround Online Limited operates a network of recruitment sites for recruiters in the United Kingdom. The company focuses on offering listings of current vacancies, deadlines, and recruitment events. Its services include recruitment advertising, targeted emailing, graduate recruitment marketing service, and brand management. The company also sends newsletters to its registered subscribers, informing them about vacancies and deadlines in the areas they’re interested in. In addition, Milkround Online carries a range of information features, including guides to working life at various employers; profiles of the career paths offered in assorted industries; and advice articles on various areas of job seeking. It serves students and graduate jobseekers, and recruiters.

The company was founded in 1997 and is based in London, the United Kingdom. As of September 29, 2006, Milkround Online Limited is a subsidiary of News International Limited.
